review: Quite friendly doctor. Wait time was low. I went for toothache issue. She has pointed out regarding the wisdom tooth decay.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: What do I say About Dr Namrtha Umesh , She is just briliant doctor, who saved my life, nothing less than a god to me . I recently extracted my wisdom tooth in some other hospital which developed infection in my mouth and it almost reached a stage where my life was under threat, One day i was in so much pain and wanted to get admitted n while my way to the hospital like a miracle i saw Dental concept clinic which is runned by Dr Namrtha Umesh and just went in, I now feel that it was God guided me there, the way her staff took care of me , and the treatment after that i received is amazing , i can not thank them enough, the way they take care of each patient who visits is just so beautiful, i would recommend any one who wants to get there dental thing to be done please visit .....we don't often get such treatment everywhere, in this era where money matters the most here is the clinic which is affordable and also feel like home ... I would like to thank entire team ,Surgeon Swathi who took utmost care of me. Everything is perfect and i will always be greatful for such a amazing team ....Thank you Doctor forever greatful.
reply_text: Thank u Mega. God bless uüôè.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe upper tooth infection where in my one side of my face was swollen and unbearable pain. That's when I visited the Dental concepts and met Dr. Namrata .  I was amazed the way she resolved the issue . Not only she saved the tooth which was in a  very bad  condition, she did a wonderful job of the rootcanal too. In my view her knowledge and expertise is highly appreciated.  I also would like to mention the entire staff are so courteous and caring I definitely would recommend any of my relatives and friends this doctor for any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review:
I visited the clinic for RCT and implant fixing . The ambience and the precautionary measures taken at the clinic by the doctor and her assistant is really appreciative which gives confidence to take treatment during the current scenario .. doctor is so friendly and explains the procedure so well .. she made me so comfortable . Because of her I was able to take the treatment during this pandemic situation . The care she takes in sanitisation and in all the procedures is commendable.. 
her commitment towards the patients is worth appreciating. I recommend Dr Namratha for all those who are facing dental issues and having fear to visit the dentists currently .. i assure  that  you will be in safe hands . 
I wish her all success ..
reply_text: Thank u so much Asha. I appreciate your patience and your trust. üôèüôè
